name: Clue: Treachery At Tudor Mansion
description: A murder mystery escape room board game but with a clue theme twist! Only playable once per group as there is only one solution!

name: Coup: Rebellion GS4
description: Similar to the original Coup, but with new roles and mechanics, have played once, with family, would be more fun with a group who knows the original well!

name: Coup: Rebellion GS4 - Anarchy
description: An expansion for Coup: Rebellion GS4 (within the same box).

name: Imposter!
description: Similar to that of Mafia but slightly different and set cards for roles.

name: Kuuduk
description: Been too long since I played this game, will update later (probably).

name: Sell Outs
description: Think something similar to Cards Against Humanity and Apples to Apples but with a major twist and completely clean (as long as players keep it that way)! The point of the game is to take your product and features to create a 'sales pitch' to win over the customer with the problem!

name: Kahuna
description: Super fun two player game where you try to control islands by having the most bridges connected to them. Simple rules but a lot of strategy (and some luck with card draws).

name: Challenge of the Superfriends
description: Never played, got as a gift, will update when played.

name: Monopoly: Empire
description: Fun variant of Monopoly where you buy brands (via billboards) instead of properties. Game is much shorter than traditional Monopoly and more luck based, but is arguably way more fun then traditional Monopoly, and great for kids to understand and play!

name: Iota
description: Have not played yet, will update when played. Looks fun though!

name: Tripoley
description: A fun mix of Michigan Rummy, Hearts, and Poker. A fun family game that involves both skill and luck! Chips included, not actual gambling!

name: Sovereignty
description: Terrible game, do not recommend, only here to tell you to avoid it!!

name: Bounce Off
description: A fun and fast-paced game where players bounce balls off a table to match patterns.

name: Kandoodle
description: A fun solo puzzle game to make your mind think! Would recommend to anyone who likes puzzles and brain teasers.

name: Dos
description: A UNO variant, where there are just more rules...

name: Scythe: Invaders From Afar
description: The 6-7 player expansion for Scythe, adds two new factions filling the spots on the board not normally used in the base game.

name: BrainBolt
description: A fun and challenging puzzle game that tests your brainpower, hand-eye coordination, memory, and reflexes!

name: Castles of Mad King Ludwig
description: A super fun game where you build your own castle room by room trying to meet specific personal goals, and meet specific requirements set by Mad King Ludwig himself! Each round a new player becomes the 'Head Architect' and gets to set the and collect the prices for the rooms available that round. Highly recommend!

name: Castles of Mad King Ludwig: Secrets
description: An expansions for Castles of Mad King Ludwig that adds more tiles, secret passages, new mechanics, and moats!

name: Carcassonne Big Box (Edt. 5 2014)
description: Carcassonne base game plus the following expansions! Inns & Cathedrals, Traders & Builders, Wheel of Fortune, Hills & Sheep, the River (superior starter expansions), and a 7-8 player expansion! Would highly recommend for families, or groups who want to have fun and talk because this game is not super heavy on strategy.

name: Scythe
description: One of my personal favorite games! A beautiful game with amazing components, and deep strategy. Set in an alternate-history 1920s period, players attempt to earn wealth and power through various means including combat, resource management, and territory control. Highly recommend! Because there is almost no luck involved or even scripting every game is unique and different, making it very replayable! THIS IS NOT A CASUAL GAME, you WILL need to play multiple times to get the hang of it, but once you do it is so worth it! This is not a game for light gamers of families, expect to spend 3+ hours your first few times playing or in larger games with people who like to really think about their turns.

name: Memoir '44
description: A history based way strategy game based on World War II battles, its be a long time since I've played but it was fun when I did, needs a group or pair of solid gamers to really enjoy it though!

name: Wooden Puzzle
description: Fun little wooden puzzle from Devilpuzzle.com, takes some time to figure out but is very satisfying once completed! I also still have the cheat sheet if needed.

name: You've Been Sentenced!
description: Fun little game where players try to come up with the funniest but grammatically correct sentences from the 10 random hexagonal cards they draw. Definitely a party game, would not recommend for serious gamers looking for a strategy game.

name: Feudal (1967 Edition)
description: My oldest game, and a classic strategy game from 1967. Similar to chess but with different unit types and a larger board. Definitely a game for strategy lovers, would not recommend for casual gamers or families.

name: Karma King
description: Have not played yet, will update when played.

name: Fifteen Puzzle
description: A simple little sliding puzzle that is surprisingly challenging! Definitely a fun little brain teaser to have around, good for traveling, and taking on the go with how small and pocket size it is.

name: Werewords
description: Simple little party game similar to Mafia or Werewolf but with a word guessing twist. Fun for larger groups, would not recommend for small groups or serious gamers. Does require app for easy gameplay.

name: Coup
description: A simple social deduction game where players try to eliminate each other through bluffing and strategy. Quick to learn and play, making it great for parties or casual gaming sessions.

name: Coup: Reformation
description: A 10 player expansions for Coup that replaces one role with a new role, adds factions, and other mechanics to add more depth and player count to the base game!

name: Solitaire Chess
description: A solo variant of chess where the player must solve puzzles by moving pieces in a specific way. Great for honing chess skills and practicing tactics.

name: Jewel Heist (Deluxe Edition)
description: Simple little game, been too long to explain properly, will update when played again.

name: Skip-Bo
description: A fun and fast-paced card game where players try to be the first to play all of their cards in sequential order. Great for families and casual gamers.

name: Battleship: Card Game
description: Simple little game based on the classic Battleship game but played with cards. Fun for quick games and travel.

name: Slide 5
description: Have not played yet, will update when played.

name: Laser Maze
description: Simple little puzzle game where you use mirrors and a laser to hit targets from different starting points and how many you can add from cards, over 60 uniques challenges included!

name: Rubik's Race
description: Simple little race to complete a 3x3 pattern on your side of the board before your opponent does the same on their side, by sliding tiles around. Fun for quick games and travel.

name: Apollo
description: A cooperative game where players work together to complete missions inspired by NASA's moon missions.

name: King Domino
description: Cool little tile placement game where you try to build the best kingdom by placing domino-like tiles with different terrains and crowns to score points. Queen and King domino can be played together making for larger games using one or the others rules not both at the same time.

name: Carcassonne: Under the Big Top
description: Expansions for Carcassonne that adds circus-themed tiles and mechanics, including performers and tents, limited to 6 players.

name: Gateway Island
description: Has a lot of different mini games that teach different board game mechanics and skills, great for kids, or for new gamers to learn what style of game they link without spending hours playing full games.

name: Suspend
description: A fun and challenging game where players take turns adding pieces to a hanging structure without letting it fall.

name: Hand and Foot
description: A super fun canasta like game, if you have not played its a must learn, while often termed a 'senior citizen' game its actually really fun for all ages and groups! Just be ready to play for a while as games can take a long time with larger groups! Links to the left are not function, will be creating a 'Schlax Hand and Foot' rule book (webpage) and maybe video soon, we play by slightly modified rules after playing thousands of games!

name: Villainous: Scum and Villainy
description: Have not played in while, will update when played again.

name: Farkle (alt. Greedy)
description: Simple little test your luck dice game, fun for quick games and travel.

name: Dominoes
description: The games are endless, there are sooooo many variants of dominoes from simple matching games for kids to complex strategy games for adults. A classic game that is easy to learn and fun for all ages. Links are non-functional, look up rules online for the variant you want to play!

name: Scythe: The Wild Gambit
description: Expansions for Scythe that adds airships and new mechanics to the base game, allowing for more strategic options and player interaction, recommended to have larger board expansion to accommodate airship movement.

name: Between Two Castles of Mad King Ludwig
description: A variant off the original 'Castles of Mad King Ludwig' where players work together to build two castles simultaneously, adding a cooperative element to the game while still competing for the highest score.

name: Monopoly: Star Wars The Mandalorian
description: A variant to the original Monopoly game themed around the Star Wars series The Mandalorian, featuring locations, characters, and items from the show, with slightly modified rules to fit the theme. Its also a much shorter game than traditional Monopoly, making it more accessible for casual gamers and families.

name: Quarto
description: A game where players take turns placing pieces on a 4x4 board, trying to create a line of four pieces that share a common attribute (color, shape, height, or solid/striped). But the twist is that your opponent chooses the piece you must place! A great game for developing strategic thinking and planning skills.

name: Chapinopoly
description: A Guatemalan themed variant of Monopoly, featuring locations, culture, and currency from Guatemala. A fun way to learn about Guatemalan culture while enjoying the classic Monopoly gameplay. Also everything is in Spanish besides one set of the rule book!

name: Qwixx
description: A fast-paced dice game where players try to score points by filling in their score sheets. The game is easy to learn but offers strategic depth as players must decide which numbers to mark off and when to take risks.

name: Plunder: A Pirate's Life
description: A fun pirate-themed adventure game where players take on the roles of pirates seeking treasure and glory on the high seas. With a mix of strategy, exploration, and combat, Plunder offers an engaging experience for players who enjoy immersive themes and tactical gameplay.

name: Queendomino
description: Cool little tile placement game where you try to build the best kingdom by placing domino-like tiles with different terrains and crowns to score points, unlike the Original Kingdominao, Queendomino has new mechanics that allow a more strategic gameplay requiring you to chose additional tiles and buy them with coins. Queen and King domino can be played together making for larger games using one or the others rules not both at the same time.

name: Age of the Giants (expansion)
description: One of the Expansions to King or Queen domino that adds a 5th player and a way to sabotage both yourself and other players

name: Murdle
description: A logic based murder mystery game using random mechanics for playability and logic puzzles to help everyone solve it, work in teams or play it solo, who will find the guilty person in what place with what weapon first??

name: Monopoly: Bid
description: Simple little card based game based off the game Monopoly, simply explained you bet on cards and try to guess what others will bet so you win.

name: A Game about Weird Things Humans Search For
description: The name is kinda explains it, its all about weird things people search for you have to try and guess what they are.
